ai-patthana22.25:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in MN 5.)
ai-patthana22.25:1.1_0: Not knowingly seeing the cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana22.25:4.1_0: Nor do you take pleasure in the dimension of infinite space. for the sake of relying on the cause or condition for the sake of thought.
ai-patthana22.25:5.1_0: Not knowing the support for the sake of investigating, for the sake of principles, for the sake of cause negligence.
ai-patthana22.25:6.1_0: for the sake of the six grounds ...
